body_html:
Building the native libraries stays exactly the same regardless of the graph you use (unless you're building with selective registration). To build android tensorflow on windows follow this workaround: #6385 (comment) Or just manually add the libraries as the comment above suggests.

body:
Building the native libraries stays exactly the same regardless of the
graph you use (unless you're building with selective registration). To
build android tensorflow on windows follow this workaround:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/6385#issuecomment-285208600

Or just manually add the libraries as the comment above suggests.
